Balder left many relics here when he died. Most are rotting in the weeds. A few still work.

{@LinkCreature:230#3001#Semas} needs help with one.

Arisel's brusque, even for one my sisters. Just ignore it.

There's a device we call {@WorkObject:95} inside {@Rgn:30007$$Balder's Pavilion} that helps the plants and ghilliedhus grow.

Supposed to run on its own, but it doesn't. Go turn it on again...please.

Lovely spot.

It's where Balder and Seren used to rest. You stood where they did.
